remarks: An ordinal is strongly inaccessible iff it is a regular strong limit cardinal, which is to say that it dominates the powersets of every smaller ordinal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
statement:
df-ina $p |- Inacc = { x | ( x =/= (/) /\ ( cf ` x ) = x /\ A. y e. x ~P y ~< x ) } $.
$d x y $.
